longText: You know these topics really well! Go to the learn page and start the next topic.
You are starting to get to grips with these topics. You might like to take a couple more quizzes before moving onto the next topic.

You made it to the end of the quiz. If there are topics you're struggling with, revise them again, and if you have a music teacher, ask them for some more guidance with the parts you're finding difficult.
